enumValues.name: FULFILLMENTS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillments/create` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment is created. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_fulfillments, read_marketplace_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENTS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillments/update` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment is updated. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_fulfillments, read_marketplace_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_EVENTS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_events/create` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment event is created. Requires the `read_fulfillments` scope.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_EVENTS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_events/delete` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment event is deleted. Requires the `read_fulfillments` scope.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_ACCEPTED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/cancellation_request_accepted` events. Occurs when a 3PL accepts a fulfillment cancellation request, received from a merchant. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_REJECTED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/cancellation_request_rejected` events. Occurs when a 3PL rejects a fulfillment cancellation request, received from a merchant. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_SUBMITTED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/cancellation_request_submitted` events. Occurs when a merchant requests a fulfillment request to be cancelled after that request was approved by a 3PL. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_CANCELLED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/cancelled` events. Occurs when a fulfillment order is cancelled. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_FULFILLMENT_REQUEST_ACCEPTED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/fulfillment_request_accepted` events. Occurs when a fulfillment service accepts a request to fulfill a fulfillment order. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_FULFILLMENT_REQUEST_REJECTED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/fulfillment_request_rejected` events. Occurs when a 3PL rejects a fulfillment request that was sent by a merchant. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_FULFILLMENT_REQUEST_SUBMITTED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/fulfillment_request_submitted` events. Occurs when a merchant submits a fulfillment request to a 3PL. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_FULFILLMENT_SERVICE_FAILED_TO_COMPLETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/fulfillment_service_failed_to_complete` events. Occurs when a fulfillment service intends to close an in_progress fulfillment order. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_HOLD_RELEASED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/hold_released` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment order hold is released. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_LINE_ITEMS_PREPARED_FOR_LOCAL_DELIVERY
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/line_items_prepared_for_local_delivery` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment order's line items are prepared for local delivery. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_LINE_ITEMS_PREPARED_FOR_PICKUP
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/line_items_prepared_for_pickup` events. Triggers when one or more of the line items for a fulfillment order are prepared for pickup Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_MERGED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/merged` events. Occurs when multiple fulfillment orders are merged into a single fulfillment order. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_MOVED
enumValues.description:
The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/moved` events. Occurs whenever the location which is assigned to fulfill one or more fulfillment order line items is changed.

* `original_fulfillment_order` - The final state of the original fulfillment order.
* `moved_fulfillment_order` - The fulfillment order which now contains the re-assigned line items.
* `source_location` - The original location which was assigned to fulfill the line items (available as of the `2023-04` API version).
* `destination_location_id` - The ID of the location which is now responsible for fulfilling the line items.

**Note:** The [assignedLocation](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/admin-graphql/latest/objects/fulfillmentorder#field-fulfillmentorder-assignedlocation)
of the `original_fulfillment_order` might be changed by the move operation.
If you need to determine the originally assigned location, then you should refer to the `source_location`.

[Learn more about moving line items](https://shopify.dev/docs/api/admin-graphql/latest/mutations/fulfillmentOrderMove).
 Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_ORDER_ROUTING_COMPLETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/order_routing_complete` events. Occurs when an order has finished being routed and it's fulfillment orders assigned to a fulfillment service's location. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_PLACED_ON_HOLD
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/placed_on_hold` events. Occurs when a fulfillment order is placed on hold. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_RESCHEDULED
enumValues.description:
The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/rescheduled` events. Triggers when a fulfillment order is rescheduled.

Fulfillment orders may be merged if they have the same `fulfillAt` datetime.
If the fulfillment order is merged then the resulting fulfillment order will be indicated in the webhook body.
Otherwise it will be the original fulfillment order with an updated `fulfill_at` datetime.
 Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_SCHEDULED_FULFILLMENT_ORDER_READY
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/scheduled_fulfillment_order_ready` events. Occurs whenever a fulfillment order which was scheduled becomes due. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders, read_marketplace_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_SPLIT
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `fulfillment_orders/split` events. Occurs when a fulfillment order is split into multiple fulfillment orders. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_merchant_managed_fulfillment_orders, read_assigned_fulfillment_orders, read_third_party_fulfillment_orders.

enumValues.name: INVENTORY_ITEMS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `inventory_items/create` events. Occurs whenever an inventory item is created. Requires the `read_inventory` scope.

enumValues.name: INVENTORY_ITEMS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `inventory_items/delete` events. Occurs whenever an inventory item is deleted. Requires the `read_inventory` scope.

enumValues.name: INVENTORY_ITEMS_UPDATE

enumValues.name: INVENTORY_LEVELS_CONNECT

enumValues.name: INVENTORY_LEVELS_DISCONNECT

enumValues.name: INVENTORY_LEVELS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `inventory_levels/update` events. Occurs whenever an inventory level is updated. Requires the `read_inventory` scope.

enumValues.name: LOCALES_CREATE

enumValues.name: LOCALES_UPDATE

enumValues.name: LOCATIONS_CREATE

enumValues.name: LOCATIONS_DEACTIVATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `locations/deactivate` events. Occurs whenever a location is deactivated. Requires the `read_locations` scope.

enumValues.name: LOCATIONS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `locations/delete` events. Occurs whenever a location is deleted. Requires the `read_locations` scope.

enumValues.name: LOCATIONS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `locations/update` events. Occurs whenever a location is updated. Requires the `read_locations` scope.

enumValues.name: MARKETS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `markets/create` events. Occurs when a new market is created. Requires the `read_markets` scope.

enumValues.name: MARKETS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `markets/delete` events. Occurs when a market is deleted. Requires the `read_markets` scope.

enumValues.name: MARKETS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `markets/update` events. Occurs when a market is updated. Requires the `read_markets` scope.

enumValues.name: METAOBJECTS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `metaobjects/create` events. Occurs when a metaobject is created. Requires the `read_metaobjects` scope.

enumValues.name: METAOBJECTS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `metaobjects/delete` events. Occurs when a metaobject is deleted. Requires the `read_metaobjects` scope.

enumValues.name: METAOBJECTS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `metaobjects/update` events. Occurs when a metaobject is updated. Requires the `read_metaobjects` scope.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_CANCELLED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/cancelled` events. Occurs whenever an order is cancelled. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/create` events. Occurs whenever an order is created. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/delete` events. Occurs whenever an order is deleted. Requires the `read_orders` scope.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_EDITED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/edited` events. Occurs whenever an order is edited. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_FULFILLED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/fulfilled` events. Occurs whenever an order is fulfilled. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_PAID

enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/partially_fulfilled` events. Occurs whenever an order is partially fulfilled. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_SHOPIFY_PROTECT_ELIGIBILITY_CHANGED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/shopify_protect_eligibility_changed` events. Occurs whenever Shopify Protect's eligibility for an order is changed. Requires the `read_orders` scope.

enumValues.name: ORDERS_UPDATED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `orders/updated` events. Occurs whenever an order is updated. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: ORDER_TRANSACTIONS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `order_transactions/create` events. Occurs when a order transaction is created or when it's status is updated. Only occurs for transactions with a status of success, failure or error. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: PAYMENT_SCHEDULES_DUE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `payment_schedules/due` events. Occurs whenever payment schedules are due. Requires the `read_payment_terms` scope.

enumValues.name: PAYMENT_TERMS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `payment_terms/create` events. Occurs whenever payment terms are created. Requires the `read_payment_terms` scope.

enumValues.name: PAYMENT_TERMS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `payment_terms/delete` events. Occurs whenever payment terms are deleted. Requires the `read_payment_terms` scope.

enumValues.name: PAYMENT_TERMS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `payment_terms/update` events. Occurs whenever payment terms are updated. Requires the `read_payment_terms` scope.

enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `products/create` events. Occurs whenever a product is created. Requires the `read_products` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCTS_DELETE

enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `products/update` events. Occurs whenever a product is updated, or whenever a product is ordered, or whenever a variant is added, removed, or updated. Requires the `read_products` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_FEEDS_CREATE

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_FEEDS_FULL_SYNC

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_FEEDS_INCREMENTAL_SYNC
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_feeds/incremental_sync` events. Occurs whenever a product publication is created, updated or removed for a product feed Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_FEEDS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_feeds/update` events. Triggers when product feed is updated Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_LISTINGS_ADD
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_listings/add` events. Occurs whenever an active product is listed on a channel. Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_LISTINGS_REMOVE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_listings/remove` events. Occurs whenever a product listing is removed from the channel. Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_LISTINGS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_listings/update` events. Occurs whenever a product publication is updated. Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_PUBLICATIONS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_publications/create` events. Occurs whenever a product publication for an active product is created, or whenever an existing product publication is published. Requires the `read_publications` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_PUBLICATIONS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_publications/delete` events. Occurs whenever a product publication for an active product is removed, or whenever an existing product publication is unpublished. Requires the `read_publications` scope.

enumValues.name: PRODUCT_PUBLICATIONS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `product_publications/update` events. Occurs whenever a product publication is updated. Requires the `read_publications` scope.

enumValues.name: PROFILES_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `profiles/create` events. Occurs whenever a delivery profile is created Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_shipping, read_assigned_shipping.

enumValues.name: PROFILES_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `profiles/delete` events. Occurs whenever a delivery profile is deleted Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_shipping, read_assigned_shipping.

enumValues.name: PROFILES_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `profiles/update` events. Occurs whenever a delivery profile is updated Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_shipping, read_assigned_shipping.

enumValues.name: PUBLICATIONS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `publications/delete` events. Occurs whenever a publication is deleted. Requires the `read_publications` scope.

enumValues.name: REFUNDS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `refunds/create` events. Occurs whenever a new refund is created without errors on an order, independent from the movement of money. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: RETURNS_APPROVE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `returns/approve` events. Occurs whenever a return is approved. This means `Return.status` is `OPEN`. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_returns, read_marketplace_returns, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: RETURNS_CANCEL
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `returns/cancel` events. Occurs whenever a return is canceled. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_returns, read_marketplace_returns, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: RETURNS_CLOSE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `returns/close` events. Occurs whenever a return is closed. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_returns, read_marketplace_returns, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: RETURNS_DECLINE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `returns/decline` events. Occurs whenever a return is declined. This means `Return.status` is `DECLINED`. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_returns, read_marketplace_returns, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: RETURNS_REOPEN
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `returns/reopen` events. Occurs whenever a closed return is reopened. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_orders, read_marketplace_orders, read_returns, read_marketplace_returns, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: RETURNS_REQUEST
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `returns/request` events. Occurs whenever a return is requested. This means `Return.status` is `REQUESTED`. Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_returns, read_marketplace_returns, read_buyer_membership_orders.

enumValues.name: REVERSE_DELIVERIES_ATTACH_DELIVERABLE
enumValues.description:
The webhook topic for `reverse_deliveries/attach_deliverable` events. Occurs whenever a deliverable is attached to a reverse delivery.
This occurs when a reverse delivery is created or updated with delivery metadata.
Metadata includes the delivery method, label, and tracking information associated with a reverse delivery.
 Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_returns, read_marketplace_returns.

enumValues.name: REVERSE_FULFILLMENT_ORDERS_DISPOSE
enumValues.description:
The webhook topic for `reverse_fulfillment_orders/dispose` events. Occurs whenever a disposition is made on a reverse fulfillment order.
This includes dispositions made on reverse deliveries that are associated with the reverse fulfillment order.
 Requires at least one of the following scopes: read_returns, read_marketplace_returns.

enumValues.name: SCHEDULED_PRODUCT_LISTINGS_ADD
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `scheduled_product_listings/add` events. Occurs whenever a product is scheduled to be published. Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: SCHEDULED_PRODUCT_LISTINGS_REMOVE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `scheduled_product_listings/remove` events. Occurs whenever a product is no longer scheduled to be published. Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: SCHEDULED_PRODUCT_LISTINGS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `scheduled_product_listings/update` events. Occurs whenever a product's scheduled availability date changes. Requires the `read_product_listings` scope.

enumValues.name: SEGMENTS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `segments/create` events. Occurs whenever a segment is created. Requires the `read_customers` scope.

enumValues.name: SEGMENTS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `segments/delete` events. Occurs whenever a segment is deleted. Requires the `read_customers` scope.

enumValues.name: SEGMENTS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `segments/update` events. Occurs whenever a segment is updated. Requires the `read_customers` scope.

enumValues.name: SELLING_PLAN_GROUPS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `selling_plan_groups/create` events. Notifies when a SellingPlanGroup is created. Requires the `read_products` scope.

enumValues.name: SELLING_PLAN_GROUPS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `selling_plan_groups/delete` events. Notifies when a SellingPlanGroup is deleted. Requires the `read_products` scope.

enumValues.name: SELLING_PLAN_GROUPS_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `selling_plan_groups/update` events. Notifies when a SellingPlanGroup is updated. Requires the `read_products` scope.

enumValues.name: SHIPPING_ADDRESSES_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `shipping_addresses/create` events. Occurs whenever a shipping address is created. Requires the `read_shipping` scope.

enumValues.name: SHIPPING_ADDRESSES_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `shipping_addresses/update` events. Occurs whenever a shipping address is updated. Requires the `read_shipping` scope.

enumValues.name: SHOP_UPDATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `shop/update` events. Occurs whenever a shop is updated.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_ATTEMPTS_CHALLENGED
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_billing_attempts/challenged` events. Occurs when the financial instutition challenges the subscripttion billing attempt charge as per 3D Secure. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_ATTEMPTS_FAILURE

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_ATTEMPTS_SUCCESS

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_CYCLES_UNSKIP
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_billing_cycles/unskip` events. Occurs whenever a subscription contract billing cycle is unskipped. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_CYCLE_EDITS_CREATE

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_CYCLE_EDITS_DELETE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_billing_cycle_edits/delete` events. Occurs whenever a subscription contract billing cycle edit is deleted. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_ACTIVATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_contracts/activate` events. Occurs when a subscription contract is activated. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_CANCEL
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_contracts/cancel` events. Occurs when a subscription contract is canceled. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_CREATE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_contracts/create` events. Occurs whenever a subscription contract is created. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_EXPIRE
enumValues.description: The webhook topic for `subscription_contracts/expire` events. Occurs when a subscription contract expires. Requires the `read_own_subscription_contracts` scope.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_FAIL

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_PAUSE

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION_CONTRACTS_UPDATE

enumValues.name: TAX_PARTNERS_UPDATE

enumValues.name: TAX_SERVICES_CREATE

enumValues.name: TENDER_TRANSACTIONS_CREATE

enumValues.name: THEMES_CREATE

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name, description and optional `specifiedByURL`, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given `__Type` is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields`, `interfaces`, and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

directives.name: accessRestricted
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as having restricted access.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains the reason around this restriction

directives.name: cost
directives.description: Provides a weighted cost for GraphQL fields and types while calculating the complexity of a request during static analysis.

args.name: kind
args.description: A specialized costing behavior for the field.

args.name: weight
args.description: Specifies a cost added to request complexity for each possible appearance of the tagged schema element. A `weight` value may be a serialized float or string formula.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Included when true.

directives.name: oneOf
directives.description: Requires that exactly one field must be supplied and that field must not be `null`.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.

args.name: if
args.description: Skipped when true.

directives.name: specifiedBy
directives.description: Exposes a URL that specifies the behavior of this scalar.

args.name: url
args.description: The URL that specifies the behavior of this scalar.
